description: This skillet brownie has it all: It’s chewy at the edges, and gooey in the center (For maximum gooeyness, err on the side of underbaking slightly.) Topped with more chocolate and a sprinkling of flaky sea salt, this easy recipe is a chocolate lover’s dream.
title: Skillet Brownie With Chocolate Ganache Frosting
title_page: Skillet Brownie With Chocolate Ganache Frosting Recipe - NYT Cooking
text: This skillet brownie has it all: It’s chewy at the edges, and gooey in the center. (For maximum gooeyness, err on the side of underbaking slightly.) Topped with more chocolate and a sprinkling of flaky sea salt, this easy recipe is a chocolate lover’s dream.
